testsuite.name: BullsCowsTest

Okay, let's start a game! Turn 1: > 0 Grade: None. Turn 2: > 1 Grade: None. Turn 3: > 2 Grade: None. Turn 4: > 3 Grade: None. Turn 5: > 4 Grade: None. Turn 6: > 5 Grade: None. Turn 7: > 6 Grade: None. Turn 8: > 7 Grade: None. Turn 9: > 8 Grade: 1 bull(s). Congratulations!
